title: Azir has been kicked out of the jungle.
body:
Azir cant use the new jungle items as he gets none of the regen, none of the dmg bonus and when using any of the offensive smites on players, the true dmg doesnt proc on hit with soldiers. @Riot could you please fix this problem?

Upvote for awareness and hopefully a fix.

Cheers,
Celer et Audax (oce)

replies.body: He's not even meant to be a jungler. So no they shouldn't "fix" this.

> He's not even meant to be a jungler. So no they shouldn't "fix" this.

This.
diamond 2 says otherwise... and your latest comment was about how good it is to have diversity in the jungle...

Who?
Oh you mean you? You're Diamond V.


And sorry,  he was designed for middle or top lane. Not the jungle.

The soldiers don't proc on hit effects. They apply spell effects however.
The offensive smite effects are for ON HIT application.

Elo decay. I don't believe it is your perogative to say where each champion is designed for, if I can make azir jungle work then thats where he is 'designed' for, unless riot comes out and says otherwise.

Especially because you are bronze 3...

Riots aim for this season is strategic diversity, which includes champion diversity within roles.

While yes I may be Bronze III. It seems I math better how than you.

And considering Riot marketed Azir as a middle laner upon release, I'd say he's not designed to be in the jungle.

But no. I'm sure taking a champ into the jungle means that they are a jungler, wait there while I go Soraka jungle, or maybe Veigar jungle... or maybe even LUX JUNGLE! OMG YES!
